author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Kirby Air Riders game is available now, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 system.  https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/kirby-air-riders-switch-2/?utm_source=SW-AA&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=S1011-01&utm_id=S1011-01

Riders, start your machines! Ride, power up, and battle with players around the world in the Kirby Air Riders game.  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Kirby Air Riders – Start Your Machines! – Nintendo Switch 2
